Module io.helidon.faulttolerance
Package io.helidon.faulttolerance

Interface Timeout

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FtHandler
    public interface Timeout
extends FtHandler
    Timeout attempts to terminate execution after a duration time passes. In such a case, the consumer of this handler receives a Single or Multi with a TimeoutException.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Timeout.Builder
      Fluent API builder for Timeout.

    • Method Summary

      A builder to create a customized Timeout.
